value:
$WmMPID_愛の祭エルフィ,ch05_20_Elfi_F_Valentine23,Face|Mmmrf... Ah, the Day of Devotion...
Perfect time to show Lady Elise
my appreciation, but the food...$k$pMmm, the food is even better than
the gift-giving.$k$pIf only we could celebrate the same
festival in Nohr. But how would we
get them to adopt it?$k$pI guess the royal family could just
make a decree. Hmm, I wonder if
Lady Elise would do that...$k$pI should go ask her! She's probably
down at the festival grounds right
now. All right, I'm off!$k$pHold on... What's that aroma? Oh, it
smells delicious! It's coming from
beyond these trees...$k$pI shouldn't let myself get distracted.
I've got to go see Lady Elise. And
yet... Ah, what could it be?!$k$pIf the smell is this delectable, the
taste must be... I've gotta know!$k$p

$WmMPID_愛の祭エルフィ,ch05_20_Elfi_F_Valentine23,Face|The aroma's so strong now... It's got
to be—oh! Is that you, Lord Leo?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭レオン,ch05_24_Leon_M_Valentine23,Face|Effie? What are you doing here?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭エルフィ,ch05_20_Elfi_F_Valentine23,Face|Following my nose. And it looks like
it's led me to quite the spread.$k$pLet's see what we have here...tomato
salad, tomato sandwiches...$k$pA vegetable stew, looks like mainly
tomatoes...and pasta with, of course,
a tomato sauce. I'm seeing a pattern.$k$pI guess you really like tomatoes, huh?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭レオン,ch05_24_Leon_M_Valentine23,Face|Ugh. This is why I go so far out of my
way to eat in privacy.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭エルフィ,ch05_20_Elfi_F_Valentine23,Face|Lord Leo, I have to ask...$k$pDid you actually take every tomato
dish from the entire festival feast
for yourself?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭レオン,ch05_24_Leon_M_Valentine23,Face|Of course not! This isn't everything!
I only took a small portion from each
of the best ones.$k$pAnd I brought it all here so I wouldn't
have to listen to my whole family
mock me for eating only tomatoes.$k$pNow, since I've said entirely too
much, I must order you, as your
prince, to keep this between us.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭エルフィ,ch05_20_Elfi_F_Valentine23,Face|Of course. Don't worry. I understand.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭レオン,ch05_24_Leon_M_Valentine23,Face|You do? You don't think this is a bit...
strange, or anything?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭エルフィ,ch05_20_Elfi_F_Valentine23,Face|Not at all. And your secret is safe
with me. I would like a small favor in
return, though, if you don't mind.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭レオン,ch05_24_Leon_M_Valentine23,Face|I have a bad feeling about this, but...
you have my attention.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭エルフィ,ch05_20_Elfi_F_Valentine23,Face|Oh, it's nothing unpleasant. In fact,
I think both you and Nohr stand to
gain from it. Hehehe...$k$p
